title: 2FA for Service Accounts in GitHub
content:
How to enable 2FA (aka MFA) for service accounts in GitHub. Login to GitHub using the credentials in Bitwarden. Click the avatar in the upper right corner and click Settings Click to enable two factor authentication Under Setup authenticator app , click setup key Click to download recovery codes [Image][Image][Image][Image][Image] Need more details: GitHub 2FA Documentation

Page Labels: 2fa, mfa, dws-user, virtual_agent
